parametersDescriptions.defaultValue: The default value. Use when the component is not controlled.
parametersDescriptions.disabled: If true, the component is disabled. The prop defaults to the value (false) inherited from the parent FormControl component.
parametersDescriptions.error: If true, the input will indicate an error by setting the aria-invalid attribute. The prop defaults to the value (false) inherited from the parent FormControl component.
parametersDescriptions.required: If true, the input element is required. The prop defaults to the value (false) inherited from the parent FormControl component.

returnValueDescriptions.disabled: If true, the component will be disabled.
returnValueDescriptions.error: If true, the input will indicate an error by setting the aria-invalid attribute.
returnValueDescriptions.getInputProps: Resolver for the input slot's props.
returnValueDescriptions.getRootProps: Resolver for the root slot's props.
returnValueDescriptions.required: If true, the input will indicate that it's required.
